otherNames: 999 Girls Chasing Me, 999个妹子倒追我
synopsis: Chen Fan is bound to the "confession system". If he fails to confess to a girl, he will get a reward. After failing 999 times, he already has everything in the world. If he fails once more, he will be omniscient and omnipotent and completely get rid of the system. Who knows that this time, the girl actually agreed! Moreover, all the 999 girls who rejected him before came back to chase him. There are so many beauties, who should I choose as my wife~
